name: makeitso
description: package json for makeitso, frontend base project setup

scripts.build:css: npm run scss && npm run autoprefixer
scripts.uglifyjs: mkdir -p dist/js && uglifyjs source/js/lib/modernizr.custom.40091.js source/js/lib/jquery-1.11.1.min.js source/js/lib/viewportSize-min.js source/js/custom.js -m -c -o dist/js/scripts.js
scripts.start: parallelshell 'npm run watch:css' 'npm run watch:js' 'npm run imageminify' 'npm run serve'

author: S. Bonardt
